channel.title: [PI] Skill Disconnecting
channel.description:
I have a problem on my server with "Fletching, smithing, and smelting." Each time you create something like bows, bars, or weapons you dc. Its not every time you level but every time you click the option. Any ideas how to fix? I ave searched Google and all I found was a lot of unanswered threads.
I do not want to recreate a new class for each skills so I hope someone can help.

item.title: [PI] Skill Disconnecting
item.dc:creator: @igli igli
item.description:
@igli wrote:

Ahh that’s what I didn’t want to do lol. Well I guess I’d waited long enough for a response for a fix and will just do that instead.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Skill Disconnecting
item.dc:creator: @deathscape1993 deathscape1993
item.description:
@deathscape1993 wrote:

Your most likely using the shit skills it came with, you’d be better off re-writing (re-adding) them using tutorials.

Read full topic
